resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104539</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104539</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085986</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The learning cycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die erlernenschleife</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cycle d'étude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ciclo de aprendizagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il ciclo imparante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κύκλος εκμάθησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ciclo que aprende</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A three-part model of scientific inquiry that encourages students to develop their own understanding of a scientific concept, explore and deepen that understanding, and then apply the concept to new situations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein three-part Modell der wissenschaftlichen 
Anfrage, die Kursteilnehmer, ihr eigenes Verständnis eines 
wissenschaftlichen Konzeptes zu entwickeln anregt, verstehendes das zu
erforschen und zu vertiefen und das Konzept an den neuen Situationen 
dann anwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un modèle en trois parties de l'enquête 
scientifique qui encourage des étudiants à développer leur propre 
arrangement d'un concept scientifique, à explorer et approfondir cet 
arrangement, et s'appliquer alors le concept à de nouvelles 
situations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um modelo three-part do inquérito científico que
incentiva estudantes desenvolver sua própria compreensão de um 
conceito científico, explorar e aprofundar isso que compreende, e 
para aplicar então o conceito às situações novas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un modello in tre parti dell'inchiesta scientifica
che consiglia agli allievi sviluppare la loro propria comprensione di 
un concetto scientifico, esplorare ed approfondire quello che capisce 
ed allora applicare il concetto alle nuove situazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα τριμερές μοντέλο της επιστημονικής έρευνας που 
ενθαρρύνει τους σπουδαστές για να αναπτύξει την κατανόησή τους 
μιας επιστημονικής έννοιας, να εξερευνήσει και να εμβαθύνει αυτήν
που καταλαβαίνει, και εφαρμόζει έπειτα την έννοια στις νέες 
καταστάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un modelo de tres partes de la pregunta 
científica que anima a estudiantes que desarrollen su propia 
comprensión de un concepto científico, exploren y profundicen eso 
que entiende, y entonces aplicar el concepto a las nuevas situaciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085986</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104539</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/the-learning-cycle</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
